## [(What to do) When Predictors Co-Vary](https://shouldbewriting.netlify.app/posts/2020-08-11-when-predictors-covary/)

By [Mattan S. Ben-Shachar](https://shouldbewriting.netlify.app/posts/2020-08-11-when-predictors-covary/)

**What is this?**

**Excerpt from blog:** Co-varying predictors can be a messy business.
They make estimates unstable, reducing our statistical power and making interpretation more difficult.
In this post I will demonstrate how ignoring the presence of co-variation between predictors when exploring our models can lead to odd results and how we might deal with this issue.
